name: ChiroHilo Table
descr:
Specifications: 220x25/40/50/54x50/60 cm.

The ChiroHilo is aÂ horizontal height table. An execellent range of operating height is achieved, allowing you to position the patient at the most comfortable operating height for various adjusting procedures. Drop at all four sections, toggle/tilt (+/-25) at headpiece, and height adjustable pelvic section.

Accessories: extra foot switch.
